trans-unit.source: Stores attachments to be sent as part of an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Lagrar bifogade filer som ska skickas som en del av ett e-postmeddelande.

trans-unit.source: Instances of the AttachmentCollection class are returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.AlternateViews%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Attachments%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Instanser av klassen AttachmentCollection returneras av den <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.AlternateViews%2A?displayProperty=fullName>och <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Attachments%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Attachments%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.AlternateViews%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.AlternateViews%2A> property to specify copies of an e-mail message in different formats.
trans-unit.target: Använd den <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.AlternateViews%2A>att ange kopior av ett e-postmeddelande i olika format.</xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.AlternateViews%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you send a message in HTML, you might also want provide a plain text version in case some of the recipients use e-mail readers that cannot display HTML content.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel om du skickar ett meddelande i HTML-format kan du också ange oformaterad text vissa mottagare använder e-läsare som inte kan visa HTML-innehåll.

trans-unit.source: Use the collection returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Attachments%2A> property to add an attachment, such as a file or the contents of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> to this <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage>.
trans-unit.target: Använd den samling som returneras av <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Attachments%2A>egenskapen för att bifoga en fil, till exempel en fil eller innehållet i en <xref:System.IO.Stream>till den här <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Attachments%2A>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AttachmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigör alla resurser som används av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AttachmentCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anropas av den <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: You do not have to call it in your application.
trans-unit.target: Du behöver inte anropa den i ditt program.
